items.longDescription:
Fighting Game Legends

This collection focuses on "Street Fighter" and "TEKKEN", two games that sparked a fighting game boom in the 1990s. In recent years, both titles have attracted fans around the world as representative e-sports game titles. This graphic T-shirt collection is an exciting representation of these longtime selling games that lead the fighting game genre.

©CAPCOM
TEKKEN™&©BNEI
items.name: Fighting Game Legends UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Two legendary fighting games are now available on UT. Don't miss this dream collaboration.

items.longDescription:
Keith Haring Subway Drawings

Keith Haring created his iconic subway drawings in the 1980s in New York City, adorning blank advertising spaces with vibrant and dynamic figures. Haring's art conveys messages of unity and social activism. These impromptu masterpieces became symbols in street art and continue to inspire artists today.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring Subway Drawings UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This special collection focuses on the "SUBWAY DRAWINGS" that brought Keith Haring into the limelight.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.longDescription:
Ukiyo-e

We are proud to present a distinctive collection that brings the vibrant tones and bold lines of Ukiyo-e prints to everyday wear. Don’t miss this opportunity to sport iconic Ukiyo-e works from Hokusai, Hiroshige, and Kuniyoshi, three of Japan’s greatest Ukiyo-e masters.
items.name: Ukiyoe Archive UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Ukiyo-e UTs with classic designs by Hokusai, Hiroshige, and Kuniyoshi are back.

items.longDescription:
METAL GEAR Archive

Experience the thrill of tactical espionage action missions, sneaking into hostile environments without being detected by the enemy. This innovative game series was born from the idea of avoiding combat and infiltrating enemy territory undetected, a complete reversal of common action gameplay resulting in the creation of a brand-new game genre: stealth action. T-shirt of the series celebrating the series celebrated its 35th anniversary in 2022.

©Konami Digital Entertainment
items.name: METAL GEAR Archive UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A milestone in “stealth action.” Innovative game series works are reissued as T-shirts.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.longDescription:
HUNTER×HUNTER

TV anime based on the manga created by Yoshihiro Togashi, published by Shueisha Jump Comics, and sold over 84 million copies (as of 2023). The story is about a young boy named Gon, who sets out on a journey in search of his great hunter and father Ging, and his adventures with friends and rivals. A collection of T-shirts featuring designs of Nen ability and popular characters.

©P98-23 ©V・N・M
items.name: Hunter x Hunter UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The masterpiece Hunter x Hunter, a turbulent story brought to life on T-shirt.

items.longDescription:
Curated by Tate Gallery

UNIQLO is Made for All. Tate’s Art is for All. Tate and UNIQLO have been in partnership since 2016, championing a shared belief that Art and Play are for everyone. For this UT collection, we have chosen artworks from Tate collection artists that reflect the spirit of Play.

Alexander Calder
Alexander Calder (August 22, 1898– November 11, 1976) is an American artist who profoundly changed the course of modern art. He is renowned for the invention of the mobile, whose suspended, abstract elements move and balance in changing harmony. He also created stabiles, or stationary objects, and his monumental outdoor sculptures can be found in public spaces in cities worldwide.

© 2024 Calder Foundation, New York / DACS London, © Tate 2024
items.name: Tate UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Introducing the first UT collection with Tate, a family of four art galleries in the UK.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Curated by Tate Gallery

UNIQLO is Made for All. Tate’s Art is for All. Tate and UNIQLO have been in partnership since 2016, championing a shared belief that Art and Play are for everyone. For this UT collection, we have chosen artworks from Tate collection artists that reflect the spirit of Play.

Wilhelmina Barns-Graham
British artist Wilhelmina Barns-Graham's abstract art is ‘a celebration of colour, texture, energy and vibrancy.’ Her paintings are bold and playful, rich in colour and full of energy reflecting the artist’s love of life.

© Wilhelmina Barns-Graham Trust, © Tate 2024
items.name: Tate UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

items.longDescription:
Curated by Tate Gallery

UNIQLO is Made for All. Tate’s Art is for All. Tate and UNIQLO have been in partnership since 2016, championing a shared belief that Art and Play are for everyone. For this UT collection, we have chosen artworks from Tate collection artists that reflect the spirit of Play.

Nicholas Monro
English sculptor and printmaker Nicholas Monro was inspired by the bright, colourful comic book works of the pop art movement. His works are witty and playful and his vibrant graphic images showcase the simple joy found in moments of everyday life.

© Estate of Nicholas Monro, © Tate 2024
items.name: Tate UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Introducing the first UT collection with Tate, a family of four art galleries in the UK.

items.longDescription:
Curated by Tate Gallery

UNIQLO is Made for All. Tate’s Art is for All. Tate and UNIQLO have been in partnership since 2016, championing a shared belief that Art and Play are for everyone. For this UT collection, we have chosen artworks from Tate collection artists that reflect the spirit of Play.

Bob and Roberta Smith
Bob and Roberta Smith is a British artist, writer, musician, and advocate. He is best known for his playful and brightly coloured ‘slogan art’, a mix of sign writing, activism, and discarded materials. His work highlights the importance of creativity in politics and education. Smith says he sees ‘art as an important element in democratic life.’

© Bob and Roberta Smith, © Tate 2024

items.longDescription:
Andy Warhol’s Collages

Andy Warhol's acetate collages showcase his innovative artistic genius. With meticulous precision, he artfully layered translucent sheets to create vibrant colors, bold patterns, and captivating imagery. These visually stunning compositions bring depth and texture to his iconic Pop Art images such as Mick Jagger, blurring boundaries and revealing Warhol's innovative spirit in capturing the influence of mass media on society.

Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.

items.shortDescription: A special collection focused on Andy Warhol's acetate collage work, including his iconic portrait of Mick Jagger.

items.longDescription:
UT ARCHIVE Andy Warhol / Keith Haring / Jean-Michel Basquiat

“UT Archive” is a project that revives carefully selected T-shirts which have been sold in the past. From the UT collection that has been on sale for about 20 years, popular patterns by Andy Warhol, Basquiat, and Keith Haring will be re-released.

Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,”with abstract marks and patterning.

Jean-Michel Basquiat
An icon of New York in the 1980s, Jean-Michel Basquiat became renowned during his short career for works inspired by his early street art and a distinctive iconography often connected to art history. His paintings, drawings, and prints drew on a diverse range of sources, from African, Aztec, and Greek cultures to Americana in the form of jazz, baseball, and social and political events.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.
© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
© Estate of Jean-Michel Basquiat. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: NY POP ART Archive UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt) (Basquiat)
items.shortDescription: Forever timeless. Selected pieces from UT sold in the past will be revived.

PEANUTS You Can Be Anything!

Images of Snoopy & Woodstock in the Peanuts comic strip from the 1960’s and 70’s are transformed into new, fun styles. The raglan sleeves give this collection an authentic Vintage vibe.

©2024 Peanuts Worldwide LLC

items.shortDescription: New graphic designs of Peanuts characters transformed into different personas are now available. The theme? "You Can Be Anything!"

items.longDescription:
Hokusai Remixed

Ukiyo-e prints were produced through a three-step process: the artist draws the image, a craftsman carves the woodblocks, and a printer applies pigments to the woodblocks and prints them on Japanese paper. As a result, many ukiyo-e works share the same motif but vary in textures and colors. This collection is made by reconstructing many of Katsushika Hokusai's Ukiyo-e works produced in this way.
items.name: Hokusai UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A unique combination of Hokusai works from the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Smooth 'AIRism' fabric with the look of cotton.
- Lightweight fabric with a stay-fresh feel.
- Narrow binding at the collar helps the neckline keep its shape.
- Slit hem design with a longer length at the back.
- Relaxed, unisex cut.
- Slightly dropped shoulders and longer sleeves.
- T-shirt with pocket.
- Suitable for casual or more refined looks.
items.name: AIRism Cotton Relaxed Fit Half Sleeve T-Shirt

- Windproof laminated functional fabric.
- Crisp, naturally wrinkled fabric is perfect for casual styling.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Above-the-knee length for ease of movement while providing protection from the elements.
- Hook-and-loop tape at the cuffs to adjust the fit.
- Plenty of pockets provide ample storage.
- Suitable for various weather conditions and temperatures.
items.name: Windproof Hooded Coat
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Outer Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Inner Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyamide/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Specially constructed without down packing for an ultra light weight.
- Anti-static lining.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Convenient pocketable design.
- Extra light and comfortable nylon.
- Minimal seams prevent down from shedding.
- 3D cut for easy movement at the shoulders.
- Wide quilting at the shoulders and waist for a soft and comfortable feel.
- Front fastener designed for extra warmth. *An extra layer of fabric concealed behind the fastener helps block out the cold.
- The storage pouch fastens with a buckle so it can be attached and detached with a single touch.
items.name: Ultra Light Down Parka
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Outer Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Inner Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyamide/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The glossy nylon ripstop fabric has been upgraded to 10 denier nylon for a lighter weight and more comfortable feel.
- Anti-static lining.
- Durable water-repellent coating for light rain. *A water-repellent coating is applied to the surface of the fabric for a longer-lasting water-repellent effect.THE FINISH IS NOT PERMANENT.
-750+ Fill Power* high quality down. *by IDFB Measurement method
-No down pack for Ultra Light Weight.
-Pocketable design. Including its own carrying bag.
- Updated 3D cut ensures full range of motion through the shoulders.
- We’ve added a strip behind the front zipper to keep cold air out.
- The storage pouch now fastens with a buckle so it attaches and detaches with a single touch.
- The tape on the cuffs is brushed on the inside for a soft touch.
- A sleek, sporty fit around the waist with a more roomy fit around the shoulders and chest.
- Quilt stitching width decreases from top to bottom, resulting in a sleek visual effect.
- Unique design ensures the hood covers the whole head, while the collar stands up neatly without touching the chin.
- An incredibly lightweight and warm down layer for everyday styling.
- Suitable for sports or casual styling.
items.name: Ultra Light Down Parka (3D Cut)
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Lightweight nylon fabric.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- A versatile, lightweight outer layer.
- Folds up small for easy carrying.
- Hood with adjusters provides protection against light rain and can be stored in the collar.
- Cuffs can be adjusted with tabs.
- Two large front pockets with slide fasteners.
- Fastens with snap buttons at the front.
- Inside pocket.
- Adjust the waist and sleeves to style it your own way.
items.name: Light Weight Coat
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: Body: Shell: 52% Polyester, 48% Elastomultiester ( 52% Uses Recycled Polyester Fiber )/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester/ Liner: Face: 100% Polyester/ Filling: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Fabric that is comfortable in all temperatures.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Moderately roomy, relaxed fit.
- Made with a 2-way design with a removable vest liner for comfort in any temperature.
- Suitable for business and casual wear.
- Clothing using recycled materials is part of our effort to support the reduction of waste and use of new materials. Ratios of recycled material vary by item. Please check “Materials” on the price tag or care label for details.
items.name: 2Way Single Breasted Coat
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not tumble dry.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The unmistakable feel of 100% cashmere.
- High knitting tension produces a more luxurious texture. Hand-washable with anti-pilling processing.
- The body, shoulder, and sleeve widths have been adjusted to suit the thicker knit fabric.
- Collar pairs well with shirts and T-shirts.
- A versatile sweater with a natural glossy sheen and moderate drape.
items.name: Cashmere Crew Neck Long Sleeve Sweater
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Dry Clean
